data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Jining, Shandong, China a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jining, Shandong, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 145,342 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Jining.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,739,607 who are far from you in Jining, Shandong, China from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Jining, Shandong, China.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Jining, Shandong, China that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 145,342 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,770,558 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.section_summary:
the county of Jining, Shandong, China has a population of 1,915,900.

We estimate Jining has 145,342 people who might know Jesus, 30,951 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,739,607 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Jining, Shandong, China to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.
